comments:
I encountered this problem when trying to run the command line version of SVC. 
Svc was built using the Jikes compiler and Ant and the runtime environment was 
the IBN CDT 1.3. The problem occurred when trying to run the first "add" 
command to add the contents of a directory tree to the database. It looks as 
if the failure occurred while trying to load the workspace.Change class with 
something wrong in the method Change.synchronizeDirectory();

The debug log is attached. The problem can be reproduced at will on my system 
runnng Windows XP with Service Pack 1 installed.

D:\SourceTree>"c:\Program Files\IBM\Java13\bin\java" -Xms64m -Xmx512m   -
classpath d:\usr\local\lib\stellation\jakarta-oro-2.0.6.jar;d:\usr\local\lib\
stellation\postgresql.jar;d:\usr\local\lib\stellation\jdom.jar;d:\usr\local\lib
\stellation\log4j-1.2.6.jar;d:\usr\local\lib\stellation\xmlParserAPIs.j
ar;d:\usr\local\lib\stellation\xercesImpl.jar;d:\usr\local\lib\stellation\svc.j
ar org.eclipse.stellation.workspace.Svc --verbose --debug=2  --location
=postgres:Stellation add abiword-0.7.8.orig
0 [main] INFO org.eclipse.stellation.workspace.Workspace  - start xerces read 
of workspace doc
0 [main] INFO org.eclipse.stellation.workspace.Workspace  - end xerces read of 
workspace doc
0 [main] INFO org.eclipse.stellation.workspace.LogManager  - start xerces read 
log
15 [main] INFO org.eclipse.stellation.workspace.LogManager  - end xerces read 
log
15 [main] DEBUG org.eclipse.stellation.workspace.Workspace  - attributes 
initial size 3
31 [main] DEBUG org.eclipse.stellation.workspace.Workspace  - workspace closed
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.VerifyError: (class: 
org/eclipse/stellation/workspace/Change, method: synchronizeDirectory 
signature: (Ljava/lang
/String;Lorg/eclipse/stellation/util/StringSet;Ljava/util/Map;Lorg/eclipse/stel
lation/repos/io/Input;Lorg/eclipse/stellation/util/IntegerSet;)V) Illeg
al target of jump or branch
        at org.eclipse.stellation.workspace.Svc.command(Svc.java:60)
        at org.eclipse.stellation.workspace.Svc.run(Svc.java:600)
        at org.eclipse.stellation.workspace.Svc.main(Svc.java:355)

D:\SourceTree>
Ressign to JG for checkout as part of Windows port.

This problem has not reappeared on Windows, at least when using the Sun 
1.4.1_02 SDK.

traces.message: (class:  org/eclipse/stellation/workspace/Change, method: synchronizeDirectory  signature: (Ljava/lang /String;Lorg/eclipse/stellation/util/StringSet;Ljava/util/Map;Lorg/eclipse/stel lation/repos/io/Input;Lorg/eclipse/stellation/util/IntegerSet;)V) Illeg al target of jump or branch
